record.Title: Birth and Baptismal Certificate (Geburts und Taufschein) for Jonas Laber
record.Creator: Anonymous
record.Description: Hand-drawn; hand-colored; hand-lettered. The main text, hand-lettered in German Fraktur with blanks handwritten in German script, is framed by a rectangular border. The county and town are written in English. Below it is a confirmation note in German script. On each side is a scalloped pot with a tulip, adorned with leaves, smaller blossoms and two scalloped flowers. Several rosettes and flowers are above and below the text frame. The abbreviation v d m after the pastors name stands for verbi divini magister, which means Teacher of Gods Word. Based on designs by Abraham Huth.
record.Subject: Flowers | Planters (containers) | Pottery | Rosettes | Tulips
